string.text: What do you need?
I need to get to Lucash, I've got a vital information for you.
And how vital is it?
Duty detachment at the farmstead near the base. Is it vital enough?
Enough. Well, pass. And don't think to make any rows - otherwise you'll be carried out for the burial.
Sure.
Hello.
Yeah.
Pard'n me?
Okay, well...
Scoffing, aren't you?
Oh! It's you, hi there!
Greetz.
It's been a while...
Have we met before?
Err... Well... Heh...
To tell the truth I haven't seen you before.
Hmm... Good enough.
What kind of a place is that?
Place... yeah, not a bad place, I guess...
Be more specific?
Ha... wacky questions... hehe...
But yet?
Hey... calm down. Now well... nice place it is. Peaceful enough. Everything is a-ok. Yeah... You calm down. Don't be in rush.
And who are you, all and all?
Talkin' of me?
Not of me, I guess.
Me. Well me. I make food here... Yeah. Kinda cook, master of knife and flavouring... Some greens, grass in general. Bread, meat, cheese - you see?
Pretty clear.
Tinned goods... condensed milk, tinned stew, heh, bulls in tomatoes... hehe.
I understand.
Lond beafs... ketchup... eggs... bread... beaf... cheese. Well you know. Sausages, wurst, game...
OKAY! I got it! What's your name, and all?

Hmm... Yeah! Slavik is my name... this is for the label... No! For the apron... I've got a white apron... Yeah, well... You sit down... Don't loom up here... Heh... Else you can be shot by the sniper, you know... heh... ahem...
There is a village nearby, isn't it?
Well.
Well what?
Hem?
Village.
Oh well... Yes, there is a village. Foodstuffs and all... condensed milk...
How can I get there?
Hmm. Let me think... Aha... Do you really need it? Calm down... Sit here... Lets have a smoke, eh?
I need to get to the village.
Okay... lets have a smoke, sit... everything is kewl, yeah... I'll take you there. That's not a question.
I don't need it. Just show me the way to get there.
Aha... Nonono... You're setting tasks... Well we'll get there together well. Lets have a sit here for a while...
Listen here do you have a clue where I can come by equipment?
Equipment? More codes...
Yes, equipment. Weapons? Maybe artifacts?
Weapons... nope... my knife... Wanna have a knife? Well. Artifacts. And what for? Don't sweat. Sit here. Lets have a smoke. And talk... about artifacts...
Where can I find artifacts in the neighborhood?

No problem. Do you know where the radioactive swamp is? No? Doesn't matter. There. I mean artifacts. There they are. While don't you make fuss. Don't exert myself. Hem? Artifacts... heg... artifacts-artifacts...
Okay. Goodbye.
Ahem... sit down, you.
I'm leaving.
Eh? No problem... calm down... Yeah? Close the door after me... I'm leaving...
Hey, sit down... lets sit...
Lets have a drink, eh?
No problem, bro. Cue it quicker.
Here. ...ah, have a shot!
Gulp, gulp... eh! Take the bottle... there is something left inside.
Well what, maybe another shot?
Guuulp... as if on high!!! Eh, the bottle is out. Got another one?
Let me see.
Yeah, here! Take another shot.
Guulp... gulp, gulp, gulp... What a master you are, that's done it, another bottle. Have you got a stock there or else?
Well... er... you drink it, drink. Hic... it's been a long time I haven't drunk anything.
For our victory!!! Really. Guuulp... yeeee oooh...
Yeah... for our victory!
...gimme more... got any, eh?
Let me see...
Hic... last one, cos I can't handle it hic... more
Give it hic... here! Gulp, gulp, gulp, gulp, gulp...
Oh, go on with you... you've finished it yourself, for goodness' sake...
Hic... eee... well... hic.. well... hic...
I've heard that Freedom grouping has got RG-6 in its possession, I really feel like looking at this thing. I would buy it but noone is selling it, actually
What? What are you getting at, bro? You want me simply to give you away all the secrets of Freedom??? Whom do you think I am?
Hey, hey. I didn't expected such gravity. No means no, I got that.
That's as it may be, you shouldn't sniff about RG5 here and there. And who are you supposed to be, huh? I see you for the first time, and you're bothering me with such questions.
Knock it off, I was just asking.
Be more careful with these, you got it?
Clear enough.
I... hic... have heard that... hic... you had got that PG-6... I long for taking a quick look at it, I really want... huh? just to catch a glimpse.
Whaaat? …oh …so... visit that... what was it... damn, I forgot... What were you asking for?
A quick look at RG-6.
Nope, that RG-6... you can't, maybe you could something else, only for you... well, yeah. But you can't look at RG-6.
Well okay... I was... err... just asking.
…hic … RG-6, huh?
What? errr... Ah! Well those wackoes... in the village... we had only two of them... but they've wasted it in the village... that's it…
Yes, what kind of... jerks. [fells]
Hi. Whatcha doing?
I've bumped off your sniper fella, and Lucash too.
Wow, what a knockout! Sweetie...

Well we want to punish that big boss from "Freedom" for murdering our guy. What a mess. If you want to earn something, eliminate sniper on the tower, cos we've got sniper rifle broken. Right in time, damn it.
OK. I'll do that.
I'm waiting.
I'll think it over.
Okay, thinker.
No, I don't want to. Besides my gun is playing tricks with me.
Well, why a hell are you wandering the Zone?
I'm done with him already :)
Well, you're the man. Take the reward for your righteous sweats.
Done with him already.
Well, bro, you did a good turn, thanks. Take the reward and remember - you'll be a welcomed guest within our grouping.

So, you've dealt with the sniper. Here is the rest of your fee. Now we'll blow up the fence and let the revelry begin. As far as you have a good aiming, your task will be to cope with the snipers on the towers.
Clear.
I've thought it over.
And what did you hit upon?
I'll think some more.
What a slow-wit.
Probably not.
Then get a hell out of here.
OK. I'll put him down.
Ok.
I've shot him.
OK. There is you money.
Please, come again.
Sure.
I just can't put this guy away.
Weekly, though. Maybe you'll try again?
Okay, I'll have a go.
Don't loiter, will ya?
Damn him at all.
As you wish.
Whatcha need?
Can I ask a question?
Move, move out. I don't do charity on Fridays.
I've been thinking and thinking and finally thought out. I've hit that lad down.
Strange way of thinking you've got. Well okay, here is your reward.
Always welcome.
I won't hesitate
How was the hunt?
Could be worse.
What will you do next?
Get back to "Rostok". Visit us when you have time.
Well, sniper isn't bumped off, but Lucash...
You've put down Lucash?!! Wow, amazing! Thanks, bro.
Hi, stalker, new here? I haven't seen you before. How long have you roped in?
Roped in?
Me? Flimflaming... well I... well everyone knows me... and er I knew Gunslinger himself..
With Gunslinger... how curious, have you been croaking grey-colored bloodsuckers together?
Go on with you.
Well and how does it look like?
Who, bloodsucker?
GUNSLINGER!
Healthy big fellow, 2 meters or above, the same in the shoulders, ugly like hell, looks like a boxer, with the touch of Asia.
With the touch of Asia?
Well yeah, he's got slanting eyes you know. And the scar all over the face.. That's it.
Clear. Tata then, warrior.
Well, usually people are roped in the Zone, and we've got it vise versa, ahem, in Zone. You got it?
Got it. No, I'm new here. And you?

Oh! I've been here for so long. I may say from the very beginning. There was nothing then - not a single grouping, no militaries - only monsters and me. Quite a number died by my hand... well... hands. Remember myself fighting with TEN bloodsuckers at once!!!
With ten? Well-well.

Don't you believe me? This was at night - nothing visible, only the eyes shining and the wind blowing... yeah... there were heavy rains as well that day. Suddenly that bloodsuckery beast appears and leaps on me, I burst him, then goes the second one, I give the other one, and the third one - I continue shooting, but my shotgun is stuck...
Shotgun stuck? Weren't you supposed to be shooting a burst.

Don't interrupt me when I'm talking, the forth one - I beat him with the riflebutt, suddenly I notice being held by the leg, that was another small and greycolored one - stalked me, what a bitch, I thought it had been the end of my existence...
Small and grey-colored!??? What kind of flimdy-flam is that...
Well, well, who is that?
It seems that you require help?
You are right to the very distraction. There is always a possibility to work for risky guy. Such as yourself, am I right?
That depends a good deal on what do I have to do.
The deal is actually the most routine one. There is the main breeder of those freedoOmed scumbags over the hill, which my fellows and I are going to ravage, but...
But what?
But there is a tiny problem. As the entrance to the base is heavily guarded and without using extra noddle we have decided to create another one, but...
But?

I've sent one of my guys to blow up the fence. But either it was for a good sniper or it was just an unlucky day, well he was done in. So the explosives are now set on the fence, nonetheless we can't manage to blow it up.
Why?
I don't want to send guy to direct my guys under the firing of that geek, but you're qualified enough to blow him away. He won't start firing at you at once. What will you say?
What will my share be?

This is the correct approach to the case. You'll get 2000 from us and a lots of equipment on the base - there should be a lot of corpses, I promise you. You'll both help us and will remain satisfied. So what?
Okay, if raise it to 2500... And one more thing... The life is full of surprises, so let's do it this way - I'll sweep away the sniper and get 1500, and after the battle - 1000.
Have you been studying at the trade school? Deal.
I'm on the way.
Good luck.
I'd like to have a look at him, then I'll give you the answer, right?
Right. We'll be waiting, but not for long.
Thanks for the help, Branded one. Take your fee.
It seems that we've come to agreement?

So, you have done in the sniper. Now we'll blow up the fence and start the party. As far as you have a good aiming your task is to deal with the snipers on the towers. While without snipers it will be a lot easier to get that scum - Lucash.
Got it.
That's how there are now three dorks less in the world. And you appeared right on time, haven't given us away and stayed safe. I don't think that anyone is going to discover that.
Yeah, neither do I.
Precious. Got any desire to earn money?
Well, I dunno...
Are you tired of living?
Hmmm. No.
Always.
Well, how should I say it...
Well, follow us then, you'll talk to our commander.
Commander?
Yeah. Scull - he'll tell you everything himself.
OK.
Speak, stalker.
Need any help?
Additional gun is never spare.
How are you doing?
I'll tell you the truth - badly. Something is going on in the center of the Zone, monsters are crowding out there. We've lost two more guys recently, so you're just in time. Trembling, don't you?
Now way. I'm not a boy though. So to say - "Good monster - dead monster".

That's correct. Okay, now straight to the point. Scout has returned and reported that he haven't seen that amount of monsters even in the worst dreams, he couldn't even tot them up. So it'll be really hot in here next night.
Monsters are not as dreadful as humans...

You're right. Even though we'll have to encounter humans, if those can be treated as the ones. Monolithians groups are attempting to break through time to time. I hope they won't be here with the monsters.
Where is my location supposed to be?
Take the machine-gun. Don't rush forward, you can get under the cross-fire. Is the task clear?
Got it!
I look forward to seeing you alive in the morning. And don't go too far, or you'll be considered as the deserter. With all the ensuing consequences... Dismissed.
Pick up the location for thee, you won't have time during the combat.
Every one's dead or there will be others?
It seems that everyone. As to me, it's enough for today. Thanks for help. Here, take these money - they may come in handy.
Good luck to ye...
Thanks, we'll need it.
I'm listening to you, stalker.
I've been sent by Lucash to provide help.
O, a recruit! How appropriate! Another gun is never out of place.
Where can I take the shells, cos I'm running out of them.
I've got ammunition for AK and LR. Which one you require?
For AK.
Take these.
For LR.
Take it.
Give me all you've got!
Drop your cheeks.
Oh well these won't fit my gun.
Hem, we've got nothing more.
What kind of place is that at?
We call it "Barrier". And actually it is the one. This is the last remaining civilized armypost in the Zone, buffer between humans and feral territory.
And what is farther?

Further is death. Well, or the lot to "serve monolith" - My monolith! In your name! Bla - bla - bla. In short I wouldn't advise you to go there. Well that's why we're playing in the host of Light - preventing the forces of the dark invade the Zone. And moreover detain reckless adventurers, at least warn them not to poke into there.
What do you need this for? You could withdraw, instead of risking every day for the sake of the others.

Who else if not we? Duty? Well they are truly experts as to the expermination, crusification and dispatching the monsters. But they will never do anything for the others, can you see them here? No? Me either. Strange... Moreover we haven't set a goal to extirpate the creatures inhabiting the Zone, while we realize the necessity of the barrier - line which shouldn't be stepped over by neither side, otherwise it may lead to unpredictable consequences.
Like what?
Unpredictable. I said that.
Stand right there. Access to the arsenal is allowed only to members of the grouping.
Well, this is it. Now you can enter arsenal together with us. But there is a slight problem...
Again? And what has happened?
Don't be frightned there's nothing scary. Just the lock is stuck. Hehe. If you need it urgently, shoot it off to the hell, I'll put the new one later.
Clear.
Well that's it. The beast is dead. We're getting back to the base.
Skinflint sent me to ask if you need fresh diapers?
And what have brought you, stalker, here, clear out until it's too late.
Diapers... What a nerd.
Well, you've made quite a mess yesterday...
And what have I done? I don't remember a hell...

We were sitting here, looking around, while you went nearby on the total bender. Straightly to the village. Although we've managed to stop you and laid you to rest, otherwise everything could happen to you...
Why are you sitting here?
We are here to search for the artifacts, but two of our team died somewhere there. It seems that some beast broke through from Radar.
Exactly. He says that you are stuck here and not likely to pass to the village. Something happened?
How are you getting on?
Fine. I've creamed the beast.
Well, and what does it look like?
Like a stange guy in some ragged robe, go and see. It distress your brains, that bitch. By the way, you guys have put their feet up near the water-tower, and apparently they've shot themselves.
Eh, that's horrific... Thanks, buddy.
Welcome...
A hell knows. Some beast appeared here, or even several of them. Few our guys went to the village, and haven't come back. And we, actually, don't want to die.
What are you wandering here like a spook?
Oh, nothing, just looking around.
So you are even not up on it yourselves?
That's it. Well, and if you've settled everything with Skinflint, than go to the village and see... Leave me your postal address, we'll send you the funeral note and all...
Dream on. Okay, I'm gone to hund down your beast.
As you like...
Take a gratitude for assisting guys at "Barrier", ok let it be, you can rest at the base area and you may ask for our help if necessary. From me personally you get a money reward.
Hi, stalker. What do you need?
I'm here on business.
What the... you've vamoosed the blockpost? Get lost from the base and keep out of my sight.
And what kind of business do you have?
See the world, show myself...
Well, then move on and show.

The group of Duty has dispatched your patrol on the road to "Rostok". And to all appearances they are going to visit us. And I don't actually like it the rules within the Duty faction, thus I've decided to notify you. They've camped at the farm, between the base and the road to "Rostok". Eight persons, heavily armed.
So, you haven't coped with "Squealer" task, you've abandoned the armypost... Get lost from the base, go away!

Damn. Those get-goats are not going to leave it. Okay, then we'll have to punish them. Well, stalker, help us and we'll be grateful to you. Go to Max, he's like a corporal in here, he gathers the team and you'll dig those goats out.
OK.
Good luck.
I've coped with them already.
Wow, give me another. And how many were there?
Eight men.

Not bad. Not listen here. We've got a mole on the base, who's delivering the information on the side. And we don't have a clue of who he is. The only thing we know is that he's someone from the privates. Your task - look for him and find out, whom he is passing the information to. I think that after the today's mayhem he'll attempt to meet with the liaison. This mole is someone from the team sitting nearby the fire on the platform. As soon as you define him, follow him stealthy. But be careful, so he won't see you, otherwise we'll find out nothing. When you discover whom he is meeting with, act on your own disctretion, but be sure to report me on the results.
That means that I have a right to blow him away after the meeting?

Precisely. I guess that he'll try to go on the meeting somewhere between 10 pm and 11 pm. It's rather dark in this time, so only few may see him, while the night mutants haven't shown yet. Advance, stalker. When you fulfill the task you can consider yourself to be a member of our grouping . Remember, the rat must be caught red-handed! That means that he has to be shot during the meeting, otherwise the task will be failed.
I'm telling you - visit Max.

So, the task is fulfilled. Not bad. Not listen here. We've got a mole on the base, who's delivering the information on the side. And we don't have a clue of who he is. The only thing we know is that he's someone from the privates. Your task - look for him and find out, whom he is passing the information to. I think that after the today's mayhem he'll attempt to meet with the liaison. This mole is someone from the team sitting nearby the fire on the platform. As soon as you define him, follow him stealthy. But be careful, so he won't see you, otherwise we'll find out nothing. When you discover whom he is meeting with, act on your own disctretion, but be sure to report me on the results.
That means that I have a right to blow him away after the meeting?

Precisely. I guess that he'll try to go on the meeting somewhere between 10 pm and 11 pm. It's rather dark in this time, so only few may see him, while the night mutants haven't shown yet. Advance, stalker. When you fulfill the task you can consider yourself to be a member of our grouping . Remember, the rat must be caught red-handed! That means that he has to be shot during the meeting, otherwise the task will be failed.
Are you still here?
You're the man. Now you can rest on the base territory, when you want to, you can rely on our help.
Is there any other work?

If you feel the strength inside, you can go to the outpost at the entrance to Radar - according to several signs there is supposed to be mutants' or Monolith next try to break through. Guys may need a hand.
Well, you helped the guys at the Barrier, so take your time to rest.
Take a rest. No work for you yet.
Well, you've failed the task... Too bad. But you have another chance to recover...
Which is that?

According to several signs there is a probability of the following attempt to break Monolith through from Radar. They will try to crowd the mutants in and then will try to break through themselves under mutants cover. Go to Kep, Barrier commander in chief, find out if they need any help.
OK. I'm gone.
Get on with it...
Well, then continue roaming...
I'm already gone...
You've flopped the task, now we can kiss those documents good-bye. We don't need such duds.

Well, you've failed the task... That's too bad. But since you helped guys at the Barrier, so be it: now you can have a rest here within the base's territory whenever you want, you can reckon on our help.
Is there any other work to do?
No, so far.
I've told you to go to army post.
Lucash told me that you befit well. Have you seen the fellas at the farm?
No.
Damn. Follow us.
Let's go.
Yeah.
How many?
I don't have a damn clue.
Six-eight persons. Well equipped.
Go to Lucash.
Any questions?
Yeah. Lucash set the task - intercept Duty's courier on his way from Radar to Dead city. Can you tell me how is it better to be done?

Hem. You'd better intercept him untill he reaches the village near to the passage to Dead city. He's likely to be awaited there and I don't think you'll be able to cope with them all. Besides you'll have to pass the village, while it's better not to show yourself in there. Move eastwards and hurry.
What is there in the village?
Nothing pleasant, believe me. Many beasts, as well as many anomalies. I'll tell you later.
Should I congratulate you?
You should.
Can't you do a work for me?
What's my interest in it?
Well, you'll have my Desert Eagle as a reward. Good barrel, powerful shot.
And what do I have to do?

Some guy is hiding at the bogs, he’s one of ours. He’s gone mad after visiting village and nobody can approach him now. Partly because he shoots at everyone in the field of vision and partly because of the old minefield around his swamp. We are fed up with him, but you a smart fellow; you may succeed in stalking upon him.
Why won't you go yourself?
Lucash has forbidden to poke around there - we haven't got that many guys at all.
Well, all right. I'm likely to visit that place...
Damn it, my life is much more valuable.
As you know...
Then good luck. There is an old minefield, but mines can be walked around with prayers and bolts.
A heck with it.
Well, as you want...
Here's the flash-drive, I've picked it up from that madman.
Well, thank you, bro. Take the promised gun.
Oh, danke... And what about shells?
Only what's in clip. Sorry but I don't have more. Talk to Skinflint, he's surely to have some.
How are you doing?
Here is your flash-drive.
What, already?
What do you want to know?
Greetz, stalker! What have brought you here?
Business. Can you suggest whom shall I buttonhole here?
Try Lucash - he's a big B over here. Go to the main building.
I see that you've coped with the task. Hand the documents over to Lucash.
Tell me about the village.

Village? A loathsome place. It was formerly inhabited by boars, dogs, fleshes, in general - all small fry. We've been visiting it for the artifacts. Now only few know what's going on there. Bloodsukers appeared from nowhere, this is for certain, it can be really fatal to poke nose there at night. Our last expedition has perished with its full complement, excluding one guy, who had his mind lost from then on.
What kind of area is this?
Everything for a little. Abandoned village, swamp, artifacts field... And what are you interested in?
Well, you've seen it with your eyes.
What kind of village?

Village? A loathsome place. It was formerly inhabited by boars, dogs, fleshes, in general - all small fry. We've been visiting it for the artifacts. Now only few know what's going on there. Bloodsukers appeared from nowhere, this is for certain, it can be really fatal to poke nose there at night. Our last expedition has perished with its full complement, excluding one guy, who had his mind lost from then on.
Swamp? And what is within?

It has once been a lake full of fish and now it's turned into a swamp. Not a childish radiation in there, none of the protection suits helps. The last one who nosed around there died tormented from the dose received.
Why has he been nosing around the swamp?

One guy camps there, without any sign of noddle. Survived the village at night, then he went off the candle. He's apparently a lucky person, since soldiers have mined almost everything in there, but he made his way to the house and still sits there, shooting off everything that comes nearby.
Artifacts? Interesting. Where is it?
To the east from the base. But you ought to avoid that place as the pseudogiants have inhabited that place. They can attempt to have you on the lunch.
And where are these roads leading to?

They can get you to Rostok, but perhaps it's where you've come from. Pass to Radar to the North, but there are few who travel there - nobody wants to finish their lives by way of the plant. The road to the East leads to Dead city - mercenaries are there, they shoot everyone they see, however there is something to satisfy them with.
And where can I buy ammunition nearby, or a gun?
In the main building, on the ground floor, there is a Skinflint sitting to the left. He's in charge for trade. You can even offer him artifacts.
Hi stalker! Feel like getting your adrenalin dose?
What do you mean?
You see, it's all about the place here. Monsters run, bullets whine, explosions, screams - kind of front line.
I thought only Freedom were guarding this line but here you come? So you are here for adrenalin sake only?

Well, yes and no. In fact we're waiting when something happens with this damn radiation or what a hell it is at Radar. We are the first to reach the promised land then. Plenty of artefacts and booty will provide a worthy life when we retire.
So you came here for booty?

Sure. It's Kep and his "paladins" who's here for noble aims comprehensible only for him. And we? We are just ordinary guys, who want to live the way we do. Kep is not aware of our position but he's a wit person and understands that six extra guns won't be spare. That's how the things are.
Where are you going and what is your business in it?
What business can be in walking roundabout the Zone?
Hey man, don't be rude, give me an answer.
Searchin' artifacts, of course.
Couldn't have thought out anything better? OK, go, and don't brawl, it'a a base of "Freedom" faction, so play nice.
You are on the territory of Freedom's base, lad, so behave appropriately.
I do what I want to.

Dream on. Be as meek as a lamb, don't mess here otherwise you'll have only yourself to blame. There was once a guy here - like, who's the man, i'm the man, I'll do you all in one go... A slow-witted one in a word, so we made him walk naked across the minefield, we heard Skinflint screaming when that chap's hand hit his head - you'd only hear... Clear?
Got it, I'm not that stupid after all. Besides, I've never wished to become a sapper.
Attaboy - get lost.
Ah, fresh meat.. Come here.
Come again?
Hey! Come on, stay - aboriginals scoffed Cook not for nothing, you now, there was a point in it.
I'M NOT TASTY!!! I suffered from various diseases in childhood - jaundice, rachitis, haemorrhoids...
Damn it, you should have talked about this at first, what a waste of time....Eh, not tasty one. Get lost.
What is it you don't understand? Haven't you heard a slow-witty-guy-history?
But what's about meat?
Well, these starvation days, you see...
What do you mean?
I am mean, hungry fighter - bad fighter. And we are so many here...
So what?
Where can we get enough meat from? And here you are just in time...
Weeell....I'd better be going.
Well, dude, is everything fixed?
Why fixed?
Oh, I'm sick just of it. If something spoiles anywhere, they immediately ask me to fix it.
And who are you?
I'm you dear old uncle... mechanician. Home-maker, darn it. Fixing and repairing guns, and everything that is gathered here. Well, I've decided to bring all the stuff into an order.
How are you doing?
I've managed to patch up one machine. While the others are just a simple trash. Have you got any booze? I could have exchanged it with a scope...
Alas, I'm all out...
Pity. But if you find one - drop in...
Bye.
Not a bad deal. Take it.
Well, thanks. I'll chill out with it later...
Good luck.
Don't bother me, I'm thinking...
Okay.
What do you need?
I've got a floorer - where can I find artifacts, weapons?
I've got some, for money. Or you can find some in the village for free, but the risks are higher.
Village?
Village. There are heaps of anomalies there and novices often trap into them. Our guys went there - join them, if you want.
Clear.
Well, what have you got?
So what do you want?
I want to ask where I can get some artifacts?
In the same place as usual - in anomalies. What kind of bozo you are! But... there's some variants.
Read out the list.
First clause is comprehensible - anomalies are the key. Second - I can give you a "Crystal", if you do me a favour...
What favour?
My fearful fellas can't fetch any artifact from the village. They say some beast inhabits it. When you clear up the situation you'll get a "Crystal" from me.
Is it so bad?
It is even worse. They reported a couple of guys took off to a village and haven't returned. And another three are sitting nearby there. Fortune favors the bold, damn it.
I see, I guess I'll take a walk there...
That's a horse of a different color. When you find something - I buy it at a good price.
As you wish...
I saw you guys there.
Yeah, and?
They are sitting looking around...
Well, if you help them in hunt, I'll give you an artifact "Crystall flower". What can you say?
We talked and went along the village to catch some kind of mutant...
So, what? Don't beat about the bush!

We butchered some beast but guys are dead. As we approached water-tower they grasped their hands and I got a bloody mirage before my eyes... This \nbeast effects one's brain. I shot it, but it didn't help guys.
Awfull... Gloomy was a skillful stalker. It's a pity. OK, take this artifact for you helped guys.
The guys went hunting, I came back here...
I see.
Can I get an equipment by you.
Well, for some money you can everything...
How was the hunt?
Bad. This creature effects one's brain. The guys are dead...
How?

Fist it was everything ok, as we reached the water-tower it something happened to them. They threw weapons and grasped their heads. I got a a bloody 
mirage before my eyes as this beast appeared. Human alike in some shabby clothes. I hardly killed it. As this beast croaked the guyes died too. Maybe it 
effects on their brains... I feel bad until now...
Damn it... Gloomy was skillful stalker. It's a pity. OK, here is you reward.
I told you find Gloomy in the village.
Fuck him...
You won't get a reward then.
I don't need i.
OK, I'm going
So you failed the mission... You won't get an artifact.
I didn't really want to.
Have you got a cook here ?
Sure. What for do you need it ?
Well, want to get some grub from him.
He's at his place, murmuring.
Murmuring ?
Exactly. Finished drunkard he is. Be it not for his cooking talent, he would be expelled from the base long ago. Find him at the kitchen. I'll give you a hint - you should locate him easily.
Thanks, bro.
Don't mention it.
Who's the one in charge here ?
Why do you ask ?
I've got some info for him. Serious kind of info.
Lukash holds the command over here. Go to the main building.
Thanks.
Same to you. What have brought you here?
Who is the chief in here? I've got a business for him.
Lucash is chief here, he's in the main building. When you enter it - hide your weapon, otherwise they can open fire at you.
Why so?
There was a precedent - Lucash was almost knocked down by some mercenary. Since then we try to play safe.
Clear.
Okay, now go.
So-so. Don't bother me...
Hi !
Stop! Password?
South American Swallow!
Right! Pass in!
What kind of swamp is there in the nearby?

Radioactive pool. You'd better keep away from it, otherwise get X-rayed and you won't need a flashlight at night anymore. Some dude is hiding there and doesn't let anybody near, but anyway what fool will go there...
What dude ?
How a hell should i know. The say one of us, who was in the village.
What village ?
There's one not far from here. Full of mutants and anomalies. I've never been there, i'm staying on the base since recently. Ask Max - he's been long here.
Where can i buy bullets? It's a long way to "Rostok" and i'm not eager to go there at all.
Go to the main building. There on the ground floor you'll find what you need.
Stop!!
Stopped!
Password?
Bomopaglavibli.
What???
Bomopaglavibi.
Ne, wrong...
Talking horse?
Missed.
Wound, pshaw damn it. Enough of getting round. Any other variants?
Your turn.
Pip. Again, damn. You are such a swindler. Ok, i got it, so you don't know the password?
Will you give me a hint?
Dream on.
Let me in, or you suggest my spending the night in the field?
Why not, the weather is fine - it's summer so to say. Ok, if you pass the test - may go in, fail - don't blame me.
Test?
Aha, three questions only that a real man must give answers to.
I'm not afraid, go on ask.
The first one is the simplest. Ready? Listen: what's Pamela Andersons breast size?
You know nothing. Off away with you!
Shit.
You know nothing. Off away with you!
Attaboy - one can see at once you are a man!
That's who i am! I'm a Man!
The second question will be more difficult. Absorb: who many bullet does the charger of the Bizon submachine gun of the russian SWAT has?
Excellent! The more I talk to you the more I like, don't get me wrong.
I'm proud of myself!
And the last one! What's the airspeed of the South African Swallow?
What???
Swallow!
How a hell should i know this bullshit! Do you know it yourself?
Not really. I was just thinking... Ok, pass in...
You make me sick.
Whant another try? Ok then. Question - Pamela Anderson's breast size?
You are such a stubborn... I repeat - how many bullets does the charger of the Bizon submachine gun or the russian SWAT has?
